str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To chatter, be long-winded, utter empty words, stammer, repeat. From Battos and logos; to stutter, i.e. to prate tediously.
Just as, as, even as. From hos and per; just as, i.e. Exactly like.
Pagan, heathen, gentile; subst: a Gentile, non-Jew. From ethnos; national, i.e. a Gentile.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Much-speaking, loquacity. From a compound of polus and logos; loquacity, i.e. Prolixity.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen to, heed. From eis and akouo; to listen to.
